```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(DT)
library(naniar)
```

### Overview

The following table includes basic summary statistics for the dataset as a whole for a specified range of years.

```{r overview_table, echo = FALSE}
datatable(params$data1,rownames = FALSE,class = 'cell-border stripe') 
```

### Missing Plot

The following plot highlights the percentage of data that is missing. This will allow you to remove variables which exceed a missing threshold.

```{r missing, echo=FALSE}
test_df <- params$data2
gg_miss_var(test_df[, -c(1, 2)],show_pct = TRUE)
```
